The AbstractDAO class provides a generic implementation for data access objects.

Client
Represents a client entity
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class provides business logic operations related to the Client model.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class provides data access methods for manipulating Client entities.
ClientNameValidator
The ClientNameValidator class validates the name of a client.
ClientsFrame
The ClientsFrame class represents the graphical user interface for managing clients.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory class provides methods for managing database connections.
EmailValidator
The EmailValidator class validates the email of a client.

The main class of the application
MainFrame
The MainFrame class represents the main menu graphical user interface.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class provides business logic functionalities for managing orders.
OrderQuantityValidator
Validator implementation to validate the quantity of an order against the available stock of the associated product.
Orders
Represents an order placed by a client for a product
OrdersDAO
The OrdersDAO class provides data access methods for manipulating Orders entities.
OrdersFrame
The OrdersFrame class represents the graphical user interface for managing orders.
Product
Product class with the product s information
ProductBLL
Business logic layer for managing products.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class provides data access methods for manipulating Product entities.
ProductQuantityValidator
Validator implementation for checking if the quantity of a product is non-negative.
ProductsFrame
The ProductsFrame class represents the graphical user interface for managing products.
